players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie was found dead last night, so we need to be very careful today. I suggest we all share what we were doing last night to start building trust."
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Bob: "Alice has been silent and now you know why. We must vote to arrest her today to protect the town."
Diana: "Alice's silence is suspicious, but we shouldn't rush to vote without hearing from her. Bob claims to be detective, but we need more proof before deciding."

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "Charlie was found dead last night, so we need to be very careful today. I suggest we all share what we were doing last night to start building trust."
You: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
You: "Alice has been silent and now you know why. We must vote to arrest her today to protect the town."
Diana: "Alice's silence is suspicious, but we shouldn't rush to vote without hearing from her. Bob claims to be detective, but we need more proof before deciding."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
